ygData.subject: Correction to Blued 2handed hammer [Spoiler]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not correct - he is an aqua goblin who regularly comes out of the water.  I was hunting aviaks when a nearby farmer kept killing him every 30 minutes or so
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:32 AM 9/29/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>
>
>The Blued 2 handed hammer quest....i think.....
>Some obligatory spoiler space...
>8)
>8)

>8)
>8)
>8)
>Ok....as far as i know
>1.the Slime Crystal Staff does Drop off of King Xorbb in the gorge.
>2.The Water Crystal Staff drops off of Webclaw Murkwave in Lake Rathe...I
>believe he is a froglock. he is definitely a caster, and he is in the water.
>if you try to pull him out of the water, he 32K's himself. So, you have to
>fight him underwater. He will just sit there and bomb until one of you is
>dead.

Not correct - he is an aqua goblin who regularly comes out of the water. I
was hunting aviaks when a nearby farmer kept killing him every 30 minutes
or so (immediately followed by "For Sale: Water Crystal Staff, 30pp")
